body:
So I finished today my first anima 'Attack on Titan' and absolutely loved it. I recommend it myself for you to watch. But now I'd like to know if there are Anima like AOT that are worth watching but not as long as Naruto. 

Thanks.

title: Next Anima?

replies.body: Death Note is very good one
replies.body_tagged: Death Note is very good one

replies.body: Code Geass is good if action is the genre you're looking for.
replies.body_tagged: Code Geass is good if action is the genre you're looking for.

replies.body: SAO My favourite anime and I would watch it over and over again
replies.body_tagged: SAO My favourite anime and I would watch it over and over again

replies.body: Sword Art Online! Or Angel Beats... both are very good :)
replies.body_tagged: Sword Art Online! Or Angel Beats... both are very good :)

replies.body:
I would recomend Clannad(But its long and sad)...
Baka And Test Summon The Beasts(For Comedy)
Sao/Alo/Ggo(Yus)
Code Geass(Mecha Action VERY GOOD Mustwatch(TwoSeasons)
Future Diary(Great Anime) 
Death Note(Good Plot)
Cant think of any others

replies.body: Fairy Tail Is like the 4th wheel of the big three..
replies.body_tagged: Fairy Tail Is like the 4th wheel of the big three..

replies.body:
SAO (Sword Arts Online). Love the character development. 
Future Diary (Explicit) (Contains nudity and a lot of blood). 
Angel Beats. It's a sad Anime, as it's one of those tragic romantic themes.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
SAO (Sword Art Online)
Corpse Party (Quite gory and very scary) if you're too that kind of stuff
Soul Eater. (just finished it)
Fullmetal Alchemist, both the original and brotherhood.
Highschool DXD (Ecchi, but actually has a decent plot)

I'm planning to watch Attack on titan, death note and black butler.

replies.body:
op, naruto, bleach, and fairy tail are WAYYY too long imo.
I catched up with all of them like 2 weeks ago but I honestly can't be bothered to be up to date with the mainstream ones.

replies.body:
SAO- 7.5/10

Angelbeats (sad and romantic but really gud)8.0/10

Clannad (romance/ very sad and long but still gud) 9.5/10

My Bride is a Mermaid (Romance, mermaid, romantic comedy. Higly recommend it) 9.5/10, seriously, this one is hilarious

Glasslip (romace, gud) 8.4/10 so far

No Game no Life (reall intresting) 8.6/10

Ya i higly recommend you watch Clannad and My Mermaid is a Bride. :) This is all i can think of that's gud

replies.body:
• SAO: (Sword Art Online) Too much people already tell what is this. 25 eps.
  • Madoka Magica: (Magical Girls) Magic and psicologic. A bit weird at the start but really cool at the end. 12 eps.
  • Mirai Nikki (Future Diary) Psicologic (a lot), Action, Supernatural. I have nothing to say about this. Just watch it if you want =). 26 eps.
